general: Use 'Fraunces' font for all H1, H2 and main impactful headers. Use 'Manrope' for UI text.
The theme is STRICTLY DARK. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked later. The 'Publisher' vibe relies on this dark, focus-heavy aesthetic.
Use the 'noise' texture class on the main app container to give it that film/paper grain feel.
For the 'Book Preview' component, use 'Merriweather' font and a slightly off-white (cream) background if showing a 'page', or keep it dark mode if showing the 'interface' of the page.
Buttons should have generous padding (py-6) to feel tactile and substantial.

component_overrides.Card: Remove default shadow, add 1px border-white/5. On hover, darken border to border-white/20.
component_overrides.Input: Background transparent or black/20. Border bottom only for a 'form' feel, or full border for standard inputs.
component_overrides.Button: Avoid rounded-full unless it's a small icon button. Use rounded-md or rounded-lg.

do_not: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds of large sections. Use solid colors + noise.
DO NOT center text unless it is a hero headline.
must_do: MUST use data-testid for all interactive elements.
MUST implement bilingual support placeholders (French/English) structure.
MUST ensure contrast ratios are accessible even in dark mode.
